content:
# I have successfully gathered 10 stones and confirmed that I need only 5 stones to craft a stone furnace. 
# I currently have enough materials to proceed with crafting.

# Step 6: Craft the stone furnace using the gathered stones.
craft_item('stone-furnace', quantity=1)  # Craft one stone furnace
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after crafting

# Step 7: Place the stone furnace down to start smelting the iron ore.
place_entity('stone-furnace', position=current_position)  # Place the furnace at the current position

# Step 8: Insert the iron ore into the furnace for smelting.
insert_into_furnace('stone-furnace', 'iron-ore', quantity=10)  # Insert all iron ore
print(f"Furnace status: {get_furnace_status('stone-furnace')}")  # Check the status of the furnace after inserting ore
